org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight

Class TrainingMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.TrainingMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomManager

    public class TrainingMap
extends Object
implements AtomManager
    A TrainingMap matches RandomVariableAtoms in one database to their respective ObservedAtom in a second database. Any RandomVariableAtoms that do not have a matching ObservedAtom are kept in the set of latent variables.

    Also acts as an AtomManager for the first Database. Attempting to retrieve any RandomVariableAtom outside those persisted in the first Database will throw an exception. All other Atoms are returned from the first Database normally.

    Author:
    Eric Norris

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Set<RandomVariableAtom> latentVariables
      The set of atoms that have no backing of an observed truth value.
      protected Database rvDB
      The source of the RandomVariableAtoms for constructing the training map, and the source of all Atoms for the AtomManager functionality.
      protected Map<RandomVariableAtom,ObservedAtom> trainingMap
      The mapping between an atom and its observed truth value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrainingMap

        public TrainingMap(Database rvDB,
                   Database observedDB)
        Initializes the training map of RandomVariableAtoms to ObservedAtoms. Any RandomVariableAtom that does not have a matching ObservedAtom in the second Database are stored in the set of latent variables.
        Parameters:
        rvDB - The database containing the RandomVariableAtoms (any other atom types are ignored)
        observedDB - The database containing matching ObservedAtoms
